title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
summary: A rich, slow-cooked beef and tomato sauce served over a bed of al dente spaghetti. A comforting family favorite.

title: Simple Chicken Stir-Fry
summary: Tender chicken and crisp, colorful vegetables tossed in a savory ginger-soy sauce. Quick and healthy weeknight meal.

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
summary: Velvety smooth tomato soup, perfect for pairing with a grilled cheese sandwich. Ready in under 30 minutes.

title: Lemon Herb Roasted Salmon
summary: Flaky salmon fillets baked with fresh lemon slices, rosemary, and thyme. An elegant and light dinner option.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: Hearty and spiced chili packed with beans, corn, and bell peppers. A satisfying, meat-free alternative.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
summary: The ultimate breakfast classic. Light, tall pancakes ready to be topped with butter and maple syrup.

title: Beef Tacos al Pastor
summary: Marinated beef (or pork) grilled with pineapple and served in soft corn tortillas with fresh cilantro and onion.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Scampi
summary: Shrimp sautéed in a rich sauce of butter, garlic, white wine, and lemon, typically served over linguine.

title: Homemade Pizza Dough
summary: The foundational recipe for a perfect, chewy, homemade pizza crust. Requires basic ingredients and time to rise.

title: Cinnamon Rolls with Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: Soft, sticky, and sweet rolls filled with cinnamon and topped with a decadent cream cheese glaze.

title: Lentil Soup
summary: A warming and nutritious soup featuring brown lentils, carrots, and celery in a savory vegetable broth.

title: Avocado Toast with Everything Bagel Seasoning
summary: A quick and trendy breakfast or snack: smashed avocado on toasted bread, sprinkled with savory seasoning.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: A fragrant and spicy curry with chicken or tofu, simmered in coconut milk with bamboo shoots and Thai basil.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: The ultimate backyard burger with a juicy beef patty, fresh lettuce, tomato, and cheese on a toasted bun.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Chewy centers, crisp edges, and melted chocolate chips—the perfect batch of comforting homemade cookies.

title: Pesto Pasta Salad
summary: Cold pasta tossed with bright green pesto, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and pine nuts. Great for picnics.

title: Breakfast Burrito
summary: Scrambled eggs, sausage, cheese, and potatoes wrapped in a warm tortilla. Fully customizable and filling.

title: Homemade Falafel
summary: Crispy, spiced chickpea patties, often served in a pita with tahini sauce and fresh vegetables.

title: Baked Macaroni and Cheese
summary: Creamy, cheesy elbow macaroni topped with breadcrumbs and baked until golden brown and bubbly.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: Rich beef broth featuring caramelized onions, topped with a large crouton and a thick layer of melted Gruyère cheese.
